SQL_STMT_U.val: select b.DocDate as 'Doc Date', DocNum as 'Doc Num', CardName as 'Name', U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', trim(REPLACE(Comments,char(13),' ')) as 'Comments', case when DocStatus = 'O' then 'Open' else 'Close' end as 'Status', Canceled, ItemCode as 'Item Code', Dscription as 'Item Name', Quantity, UomCode as 'Uom' , U_IDU_QtyPack as 'Qty Pack', U_IDU_UOMPack as 'Uom Pack', WhsCode as 'Warehouse', LineTotal as 'Total' from :8 on a.DocEntry = b.DocEntry Where (B.DocDate between ':1' and ':2') and (CardName like '%'+ISNULL(':3','')+'%') :4 and CONVERT(Nvarchar(15), DocNum) like '%'+ISNULL(':5','')+'%' AND Dscription LIKE '%'+ISNULL(':7','')+'%' :6 and canceled <> 'C'

ExpSyntax.val: Trim({1,9})&' as A join '&Trim({1,8})&' as B '

DataViewToText(0,'Doc Date,Doc Num,Customer,'&IF({32768,111},'Consignee,','')&'Comments,Status,Canceled,Item Code,Item Name,Quantity,Uom,Qty Pack,Uom Pack,Warehouse,Total','Date,Document Number,Card Name,'&IF({32768,111},{32768,112}&',','')&'Status,Canceled,Item Code,Item Name,Quantitiy,UoM,Quantity Pack,UoM Pack,Warehouse,Total',{32768,84},';','',0)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select sum(Quantity) as 'Quantity', sum(U_IDU_QtyPack) as 'Qty Pack' , sum(LineTotal) as 'Total' from :8 on a.DocEntry = b.DocEntry Where (B.DocDate between ':1' and ':2') and (CardName like '%'+ISNULL(':3','')+'%') :4 and CONVERT(Nvarchar(10), DocNum) like '%'+ISNULL(':5','')+'%' AND Dscription LIKE '%'+ISNULL(':7','')+'%' :6 and canceled <> 'C'

ExpSyntax.val: Trim({1,9})&' as A join '&Trim({1,8})&' as B '
